Uses of Interface
net.sf.JRecord.Common.IBasicFileSchema

  • Packages that use IBasicFileSchema 
    Package Description
    net.sf.JRecord.ByteIO
    This package holds low level Record-Oriented IO routines (reading / writing an Array of Bytes).
    net.sf.JRecord.Common
    This package holds Common code used in multiple JRecord packages.
    net.sf.JRecord.Details
    This package holds Classes that describe a Files Structure RecordLayout + the lines (Line, XmlLine) in the File.
    net.sf.JRecord.IO
    This package holds all Record-Oriented IO routines.

    • Uses of IBasicFileSchema in net.sf.JRecord.ByteIO
